channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WPlite

item.title: CVE-2022-1831|2024-08-03T00:17:00.474Z -- unknown -- wplite
item.description: The WPlite WordPress plugin through 1.3.1 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
